Header.title: PT SOLUSI DARI PROGRAMMER
Header.paragraph: Di era digital yang terus berkembang, kami hadir sebagai mitra terpercaya Anda dalam mengintegrasikan teknologi mutakhir dengan kebutuhan bisnis Anda. Dengan pengalaman lebih dari satu dekade, kami mengoptimalkan operasi produksi, mengotomatisasi proses, dan membuka peluang baru untuk pertumbuhan bersama.Bersama-sama, mari kita bentuk masa depan yang cerdas dan solutif!

About.paragraph: In the ever-growing digital era, Solusi Programmer is here as a trusted partner in providing integrated technology solutions. With more than 10 years of experience, we focus on helping businesses optimize operations, increase efficiency, and utilize the latest technologies such as IoT, industrial robotics, panels & wiring, to web development and digitalization.

Services.name: Industrial Automation System
Services.text: We provide intelligent automation solutions that optimize industrial operations, reduce human error, and increase production efficiency through advanced control systems.

Services.name: Industrial Panel Manufacturing
Services.text: We design and manufacture high-quality industrial control panels tailored to meet specific automation needs, ensuring reliability, safety, and compliance with industry standards.

Services.name: Bulding Management System
Services.text: Our Building Management Systems integrate HVAC, lighting, security, and energy systems into one smart platform to improve operational efficiency and occupant comfort.

Services.name: Server Installation And Networking
Services.text: We deliver reliable server setups and robust networking solutions to ensure secure, scalable, and high-performance IT infrastructures for modern business operations.

Services.name: IoT And Web Application Development
Services.text: We build integrated IoT and web-based solutions that enable real-time monitoring, remote control, and data-driven decision-making to enhance operational visibility and connectivity.

Services.name: Cyber Physical System Management
Services.text: We deliver secure and adaptive cyber-physical system management that bridges physical processes with digital intelligence, ensuring synchronized operations, resilience, and smart automation.

Features.title: Paneling dan Wiring
Features.text: Kami menyediakan layanan profesional untuk pembuatan panel listrik seperti SDB, MDB, dan panel kontrol, serta wiring dengan standar keamanan dan kualitas terbaik. Solusi kami dirancang untuk kebutuhan industri Anda.

Features.title: Internet of Things
Features.text: Ubah bisnis Anda dengan perangkat terhubung. Solusi IoT kami memungkinkan komunikasi yang lancar antara perangkat pintar, meningkatkan efisiensi, dan memberikan wawasan waktu nyata untuk pengambilan keputusan yang lebih cerdas.

Features.title: Robotic Industrial
Features.text: Optimalkan operasional Anda dengan solusi integrasi proses dan sistem robotik industri. Dari otomatisasi hingga teknologi robotik mutakhir, kami membantu Anda meningkatkan produktivitas

Features.title: Web Development
Features.text: Bangun website dan aplikasi yang tangguh dan ramah pengguna dengan keahlian kami. Kami menciptakan platform digital yang responsif, scalable, dan aman, sesuai dengan kebutuhan bisnis Anda..
